en.hero_headline: Reputation-based noise filtering for Open Source.
en.hero_subline_1:
Trusted contributors work freely. Unverified accounts provide a Security Deposit.
Your inbox stays clean. Good devs aren't blocked. Spam disappears.
en.problem_text:
Maintainers are burnt out.
Your repo is getting flooded with low-quality contributions from new accounts and automated tools.
Filtering noise is unpaid labor.

If this continues, maintainers will quit and critical infrastructure will rot. You shouldn't have to choose between an open repo and your sanity.
en.solution_text:
We introduce a Reputation Shield for Pull Requests.

Phase 1 - The Gatekeeper: When a PR is opened, we calculate a Risk Score based on GitHub account age, historical merges in protected repos, and whitelist status.

Phase 2 - The Outcome:
• Low Risk: PR accepted immediately. Label: CR-Trusted.
• High Risk (new/flagged accounts): PR auto-closed with instructions.

Phase 3 - The Security Deposit (Bail):
Unverified users can deposit $5 to re-open their PR.
• PR Merged or Closed: Deposit refunded automatically.
• Maintainer flags as Spam: Deposit slashed to repo treasury.

Result: Trusted devs work freely. New contributors prove intent with a refundable deposit. Spam becomes financially painful.

---

FOR MAINTAINERS
Stop reviewing noise.
Install the GitHub App. Set your reputation threshold. Done.
Trusted contributors pass through. Unknowns provide a deposit. You keep full control over what gets merged.

FOR CONTRIBUTORS
Your reputation follows you.
Build merit across protected repos. Once trusted, you never pay.
New to the ecosystem? A $5 refundable deposit proves you're serious.
If your code is good, it costs you nothing.

FOR COMPANIES
Your dependencies are maintained by burned-out volunteers.
Fund the Treasury: Send funds directly to a project's smart contract.
These funds become bounties for verified contributors.
Transparent. On-chain. Accountable.

Want to fund development? Email us.

en.social_proof_cta: Maintain a project with 1000+ stars? You get priority. Get in touch.
en.faq_q1: Don't similar tools already exist? (Tea.xyz, Gitcoin...)
en.faq_a1:
Yes. Their incentives are broken.

Tea.xyz: Pays based on dependency graphs. This incentivizes low-quality submissions to farm tokens. They add noise; we filter it.

Gitcoin: Relies on donations and goodwill. We're a merit-based system: proven contributors work freely, unknowns prove intent with a refundable deposit.

We're Reputation First. The deposit is a last resort, not a gate.
en.faq_a2: Programmable escrow, transparent treasuries, and permissionless reputation. Traditional payment rails don't support automatic refunds based on PR outcomes. We use crypto as infrastructure. No tokens. No speculation.
en.faq_a3:
No. It's Reputation First.

Trusted contributors (good account history, previous merges) work for free. Only unverified accounts need to provide a Security Deposit, and it's fully refunded when the PR is reviewed.

If you're legitimate, it costs nothing.
en.faq_a4: One dev building the MVP. Goal: decentralized protocol governed by the maintainers and contributors doing the work.

es.hero_headline: Filtrado de ruido basado en reputacion para Open Source.
es.hero_subline_1:
Los contributors de confianza trabajan libremente. Las cuentas no verificadas aportan un Deposito de Seguridad.
Tu inbox se mantiene limpio. Los buenos devs no se bloquean. El spam desaparece.
es.problem_text:
Los maintainers estan quemados.
Tu repo esta siendo inundado con contribuciones de baja calidad de cuentas nuevas y herramientas automatizadas.
Filtrar ruido es trabajo no pagado.

Si esto continua, los maintainers van a abandonar y la infraestructura critica se pudrira. No deberias tener que elegir entre un repo abierto y tu cordura.
es.solution_text:
Introducimos un Escudo de Reputacion para Pull Requests.

Fase 1 - El Filtro: Cuando se abre un PR, calculamos un Score de Riesgo basado en la antiguedad de la cuenta de GitHub, merges historicos en repos protegidos, y estado de whitelist.

Fase 2 - El Resultado:
• Bajo Riesgo: PR aceptado inmediatamente. Etiqueta: CR-Trusted.
• Alto Riesgo (cuentas nuevas/marcadas): PR cerrado automaticamente con instrucciones.

Fase 3 - El Deposito de Seguridad (Fianza):
Los usuarios no verificados pueden depositar $5 para reabrir su PR.
• PR Mergeado o Cerrado: Deposito devuelto automaticamente.
• Maintainer marca como Spam: Deposito confiscado a la tesoreria del repo.

Resultado: Los devs de confianza trabajan libremente. Los nuevos contributors demuestran intencion con un deposito reembolsable. El spam se vuelve financieramente doloroso.

---

PARA MAINTAINERS
Deja de revisar ruido.
Instala la GitHub App. Configura tu umbral de reputacion. Listo.
Los contributors de confianza pasan. Los desconocidos aportan un deposito. Mantienes control total sobre que se mergea.

PARA CONTRIBUTORS
Tu reputacion te sigue.
Construye merito en repos protegidos. Una vez eres de confianza, nunca pagas.
¿Nuevo en el ecosistema? Un deposito reembolsable de $5 demuestra que vas en serio.
Si tu codigo es bueno, no te cuesta nada.

PARA EMPRESAS
Tus dependencias son mantenidas por voluntarios quemados.
Financia la Tesoreria: Manda fondos directamente al smart contract del proyecto.
Estos fondos se convierten en bounties para contributors verificados.
Transparente. On-chain. Responsable.
